hero.title: Justice Capital: Litigation Finance for Confident Claims
hero.subtitle: We fund strong commercial disputes, arbitrations and enforcement actions so that justice is driven by merits, not limited by cash flow.
hero.paragraph: Justice Capital is a dedicated litigation finance platform based in Uzbekistan with access to key international jurisdictions. We provide non-recourse funding for legal fees, experts and enforcement, helping businesses, banks and law firms pursue high-value claims without locking their working capital. Our approach is transparent, ethical and aligned with leading global litigation finance standards.

businesses.title: For Businesses & Banks
businesses.description: Shift dispute costs off your balance sheet. Monetize meritorious claims and protect liquidity while pursuing your rights.

lawFirms.title: For Law Firms
lawFirms.description: Access capital to run complex cases, offer flexible fee arrangements and expand your strategic matters portfolio.

crossBorder.title: For Cross-Border Disputes
crossBorder.description: Leverage our local insight and international reach for cases involving foreign counterparties, arbitration and global enforcement.

meritDriven.title: Merit-Driven
meritDriven.description: We fund strong, enforceable claims only.

nonRecourse.title: Non-Recourse
nonRecourse.description: If there is no recovery, our funding is typically not repayable.

alignedInterests.title: Aligned Interests
alignedInterests.description: We succeed when our clients succeed.

localRoots.title: Local Roots, Global Reach
localRoots.description: Based in Uzbekistan, connected to major dispute resolution hubs.

aboutIntro.title: Justice Capital creating the difference
aboutIntro.description: We aim to foster long term relationships with individuals, businesses and organisations of all sizes by combining a genuine interest in each client's circumstances and goals with an adaptable, approachable and accessible service model.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.intro: We design flexible funding structures for claimants, law firms and institutions involved in complex disputes. Our solutions are typically non-recourse and tailored to the merits, size and jurisdictional profile of each case.

singleCase.title: Single-Case Litigation & Arbitration Funding
singleCase.description: We finance legal fees, expert costs and court or arbitration expenses for strong commercial claims. Our return is linked to a successful outcome.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Financing
portfolio.description: We provide capital secured against a portfolio of cases for corporates or law firms, diversifying risk and stabilizing cash flow across multiple disputes.

judgment.title: Judgment & Award Monetization
judgment.description: We help clients convert final judgments and arbitral awards into immediate liquidity by purchasing or financing a portion of the expected recovery.

enforcement.title: Enforcement & Asset Recovery Funding
enforcement.description: We fund asset tracing, enforcement strategies and recovery actions in relevant jurisdictions to transform legal victories into actual collections.

insolvency.title: Insolvency, Fraud & Special Situations
insolvency.description: We support claims arising from insolvency, fraud, shareholder and governance disputes, where traditional financing is unavailable but recovery potential is significant.

riskSharing.title: Risk-Sharing & Defense Solutions
riskSharing.description: For selected cases, we offer structures that cap downside exposure for defendants or institutions, sharing litigation risk under clearly defined outcomes.

about.title: About Justice Capital
about.subtitle: Pioneering litigation finance in Uzbekistan and beyond.
about.textBlock1: Justice Capital is a specialized litigation finance platform focused on high-value commercial disputes, international arbitration and cross-border enforcement. Originating from Uzbekistan, we help clients turn legal claims into financial assets by sharing risk and unlocking capital tied up in litigation.
about.textBlock2: Our team combines experience in dispute resolution, banking and finance, asset recovery and compliance. We assess each case with institutional discipline – analysing merits, enforceability and recovery prospects – and structure non-recourse funding solutions that align our interests with those of our clients.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Strict adherence to legal, ethical and regulatory standards.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear terms, straightforward economics, no hidden conditions.

discipline.title: Discipline
discipline.description: Robust selection, risk management and monitoring of funded cases.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We work alongside leading law firms and experts as long-term strategic partners.

contact.title: Contact Justice Capital
contact.intro: Share a brief outline of your dispute, award or enforcement matter. Our team will review the information confidentially and respond with potential funding options and next steps.

success.description: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
